description:
Raul Creed`s Entourage AutoReiv, Kristeva carries out her duties to Raul loyally. She later takes up the role of being Pino`s guardian, per Raul`s request. It is strongly implied at the end of the series that she is infected with the Cogito Virus, though her new raison d`Ãªtre, Pino, allows her to keep her sanity.
Source: Wiki
name: Kristeva
